short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display more comprehensive ESPN Fantasy Baseball stats with a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note: designed with Ottoneu and cumulative points-based leagues with IP limits in mind.

Calculates team Sabermetrics stats based on current weights from Fangraphs.

Shows wOBA, total batting points, pitching points per IP, and an adjusted "Actual" point total balancing all team IP.
